idx_012_cre: Create an account below, then go to the Reviews page..
idx_103_rea: Measure real-world distances, correct perspective in photos, and draw shapes directly on your screen — all in one place.
idx_110_get: Get it on Google Play Store in free
idx_201_dis: Measure real-time distance between two points indoors using the AR camera.
idx_211_est: Estimate the actual perimeter or area in a photo using a basic reference rectangle and perspective correction.
idx_221_dra: Draw shapes directly on your screen and get approximate length and area immediately.
idx_301_opt: It’s optimized not for ultra-precise engineering work, but for fast decisions on site
idx_312_tak: Take one photo on site instead of drawing a quick sketch. As long as you include a known rectangle (like A4 paper), you can revisit the photo later and estimate lengths and areas.
idx_322_whn: When you just need to know “about how many square meters this is,”  trace the outline and see the approximate area on the spot.
idx_332_ovl: Overlay measurements directly on the photo, capture the screen, and share it as a simple report with clients or colleagues.
idx_401_fro: From photo perspective correction to curved line length, Measure Master focuses on the tools you actually use in the field.
idx_411_fix: Fix distortion with a reference rectangle
idx_412_pla: Place a reference rectangle with known dimensions (for example, A4 paper). Using that, the app corrects perspective and estimates length and area on the photo.
idx_422_tra: Trace straight or curved boundaries with your finger.  The app adds up total length and area for each shape and for the overall selection.
idx_431_des: Designed for small screens and quick use
idx_432_int: The interface minimizes steps and button count so you can operate it quickly even when you are on site, wearing gloves, or in a hurry.
idx_501_the: These screenshots are the same ones used on the Google Play listing.
idx_510_set: Set up a reference rectangle, then measure lengths and areas in the corrected view.
idx_520_use: Use AR mode to measure a segment directly in 3D space.
idx_530_con: Configure units, reference rectangle values, and other options before you measure.
idx_601_aim: Measure Master aims to bring the feel of “tape measure + field sense” into your phone. Please keep the following in mind.
idx_610_tar: It targets approximate values for decision-making, not certified engineering-grade measurements.
idx_620_mor: The more accurate your reference rectangle dimensions are, the more reliable the results will be.
idx_630_car: Camera angle, photo quality, and lens distortion can all introduce error.
idx_640_legal: For legal or contractual measurements, you must still use proper professional tools and procedures.
idx_700_try: Try measuring with just a photo.
idx_701_app: The app is currently in tester-only mode, but it is already usable for real-world jobs.  We are iterating based on feedback from people who actually work on site.
idx_710_get: Get it on Google Play Store
idx_730_you: If you have trouble installing, please check the How to use page first.
